news: Along the northeast Pacific coast of Japan, Tokyo Electric Power Company commenced the official discharge of nuclear contaminated water from the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Station into the sea. Over the next several decades, the contaminated water produced by the Fukushima nuclear plant will continue to be released into the ocean. The consequences of Japan forcefully discharging nuclear contaminated water into the sea, both existing and forthcoming, cannot be overstated.
The minister of Environment drank purified water, trying to prove the safety of nuclear wastewater
